name: Rich Santa
description: Rich Santa is a community token created to help and give charity to people in need. Last year we gave to charity 3.000$ and this year we plan to give even more helping Ukraine people in need. We have been audited and passed (github here) : https://github.com/TechRate/Smart-Contract-Audits/blob/main/December/Rich%20Santa.pdf We are currently listed on Coinmarketcap and we would like to be listed on Coingecko as well: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/rich-santa/
